title: Strikes 'crippled' Syria's chemical weapons program: Pentagon
text:
Strikes 'crippled' Syria's chemical weapons program: Pentagon 1:25pm EDT - 02:06 
U.S., British and French forces struck Syria with more than 100 missiles on Saturday in the first coordinated Western strikes against the Damascus government, targeting what they said were chemical weapons sites in retaliation for a suspected poison gas attack.   
U.S., British and French forces struck Syria with more than 100 missiles on Saturday in the first coordinated Western strikes against the Damascus government, targeting what they said were chemical weapons sites in retaliation for a suspected poison gas attack.  //reut.rs/2qzyXyP
